description: Nature knows best and natural fibres are the major provider of warmth in Singi Wool Padded Parka. It is insulated with Lavalan, a sustainable padding made from carefully selected Swedish wool and PLA (a bioplastic made from corn starch). Its weather resistant G-1000 Lite Eco and long cut make it perfect for outdoor and everyday life in the autumn and winter. Soft wool flannel on the inside adds a premium feel and there are plenty of pockets for storing essentials.
name: Singi Wool Padded Parka - Mens
